titleStmt.title: The Inner-Temple masque. Or Masque of heroes Presented (as an entertainement for many worthy ladies:) by gentlemen of the same ancient and noble house. Tho. Middleton.
titleStmt.author: Middleton, Thomas, d. 1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Stansby] for Iohn Brovvne, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleetstreete,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
